full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 MEMORANDUM OF REATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL RMANENT RESIDENCE SIO Place Los Angeles, California File No. A17 181 791 TC/245/STO Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: Sex NAME MAO, BETTY PEI-ING Female ADDRESS 720 South San Rafael, Pasadena, California 91105 NATIONALITY DATE OF BIRTH PLACE OF BIRTH China Oct. 27, 1914 Shaughai China COUNTRY TO WHICH CHARGEABLE (If any) PREFERENCE: (If any) PRIORITY DATE China Nonpreference 7-9-69 REMARKS Section Sec. 203(a)(8) NONPREFERENCE: Individual section 212(a)(14) cer tification issued; Blanket section 212(a)(14) certification issued; Section 212(a)(14) certification not required because As of at (Month) (Day) (Year) Los Angeles, California (Place) Class of admission (insert coding symbol) Z-2 (NP-1) NP6 the requirements of the following provision of law having been fulfilled.
